description: Exemplar library for few-shot infrastructure detection

potholes.description: Holes or depressions in road pavement surface

alligator_cracks.description: Web-like interconnected cracks resembling alligator skin

longitudinal_cracks.description: Cracks running parallel to the road direction

transverse_cracks.description: Cracks running perpendicular to the road direction

manholes.description: Manhole covers on the road surface

damaged_paint.description: Faded or damaged road markings and paint

damaged_crosswalks.description: Faded or damaged pedestrian crosswalk markings

dumped_trash.description: Illegally dumped garbage, debris, or litter on roadway

tyre_marks.description: Tire skid marks on road surface

exemplar_schema.filename: string - Image filename in category folder
exemplar_schema.bbox: [x1, y1, x2, y2] - Bounding box of the object in the image
exemplar_schema.description: string - Brief description of what the exemplar shows
exemplar_schema.severity: string - optional severity level (critical, high, medium, low)
exemplar_schema.source: string - optional source of the exemplar (dataset name, manual, etc.)
exemplar_schema.confusion_reason: string - For negative exemplars, why this might be confused
